# User Guide

## Setup
- Python 3.12+ required.
- Run `python src/main.py` to start CLI.

## Usage Examples
- Add Shop: Choose 1, enter details.
- CRUD Rentals: Add (2), List (5), Update end date (7).
- CRUD Maintenance: Add (3), List (6), Update status (8).
- Delete Shop: Choose 9 (cascades to delete related rentals/maintenance).

Test with: Add a standard shop, add rental, list, update, delete.
